summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Kamil Dyczkowski website animations and layout changes. All requested features are working perfectly.
passed_tests: Hero animation - 3 lines appearing sequentially with proper delays (0.1s, 0.3s, 0.5s)
Scroll animations - 6 fade-up elements and 15 stagger-item elements working correctly
Section order - Q1 2026 Pilot Cohort positioned before FAQ section as requested
Hover effects on glass cards - 16 cards with subtle highlighting and transform effects
Mobile responsiveness - menu button and dropdown working correctly
JavaScript functionality - IntersectionObserver for scroll animations working
CSS animations - All keyframes and transitions properly defined
GitHub Pages compatibility - Pure HTML/CSS/JS without frameworks
